thread.title: Man Accused Of Stabbing Mother To Death In Lawrence County
thread.title_full: Man Accused Of Stabbing Mother To Death In Lawrence County

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: Man Accused Of Stabbing Mother To Death In Lawrence County
text:
Man Accused Of Stabbing Mother To Death In Lawrence County January 29, 2017 10:16 PM By Lisa Washington 
NESHANNOCK (KDKA) â€” A man is facing charges for allegedly stabbing his mother to death inside her Lawrence County home. 
It happened Sunday in the 300 block of Lanewood Drive in Neshannock Township. 
Neshannock Township police received a call just before noon for a domestic violence incident and requested help from Pennsylvania State Police. 
Police say Lauri Craven, 57, was stabbed multiple times after she got into an argument with her 27-year-old son, Dean. She was pronounced dead at the scene. 
Dean Craven stayed at the scene and was arrested without incident. 
He is facing charges including criminal homicide and aggravated assault. 
He has been placed in the Lawrence County Jail without bond. 
  Lisa Washington Lisa Washington joined KDKA TV in May of 2015. Previously, she covered breaking news and developing stories at our sister station, KPIX CBS 5, in San Francisco. Lisa brings more than a decade of experience in anchoring and reporting local news...
